scripts.build:linux: cd ../backend && bun run build:linux && mv langlearnbot-backend-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ../frontend/src-tauri/binaries && cd ../frontend && bunx tauri build
scripts.build:mac: cd ../backend && bun run build:mac && mv langlearnbot-backend-aarch64-apple-darwin ../frontend/src-tauri/binaries && cd ../frontend && bunx tauri build
